column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////My daughter told me how i had to try this place as it was the hot spot in Chicago dining..........................its was ok.  I ate in the basement dining room (actually best place to be
column3: much less noisy)   Fried chicken was out of this world good.  Steaks very good.  Steaks are pricey
column4: pricier than most upscale steak houses.
